item.title: Feature Overview
item.description: The tables below summarize Aspose.Cells for .NET features and provide links to detailed feature descriptions. Contents Summary 1 Supported Platforms 2 File Formats and Conversions 3 Rendering and Printing 4 Spreadsheet Content Features 5 Spreadsheet Formatting Features 6 PageSetup Features || Supported Platforms Aspose.Cells for .NET product covers most of the popular development environments and deployment platforms.
